ISSUE.TITLE: BaseDataProvider - Methods don't expose command timeout
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: Previously IDbCnontext.ExecuteSqlCommand(...); used to accept a timeout parameter. In the new 4.30 version there doesn't seem to be a way to set the timeout on a command. BaseDataProvider.ExecuteNonQuery() and other methods that use a CommandInfo. Not sure if I might have missed how to set the timeout on a CommandInfo so let me know if there is actually a way.
